channel.title: Survey on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Survey on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey Service Datatype Description Every SoftLayer survey is defined in the SoftLayer_Survey service. Softlayer survey’s have questions and answers from SoftLayer users. Methods getActiveSurveyByType Provides survey details for the given type getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Survey record. getQuestions Retrieve the questions for a survey. getStatus Retrieve the status of the survey getType Retrieve the type of survey takeSurvey Respond to the questions that a survey has.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey. Local active A flag indicating if a survey can be taken. Type: integer createDate The date that a survey had originally started. Type: dateTime id A survey's id. Type: integer name A survey's name or title.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey. Local active A flag indicating if a survey can be taken. Type: integer createDate The date that a survey had originally started. Type: dateTime id A survey's id. Type: integer name A survey's name or title. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Answer data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey answer. Local answer A survey answer's answer that a user can response too. Type: string answerOrder A value indicating the order in when a survey answer will be displayed to a user. Type: integer id A survey answer's Id. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Answer data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey answer. Local answer A survey answer's answer that a user can response too. Type: string answerOrder A value indicating the order in when a survey answer will be displayed to a user. Type: integer id A survey answer's Id. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Question Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Question data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey question. Local id A survey question's Id. Type: integer isRequired A flag indicating that a survey question requires a response. Type: integer multiAnswer A flag indicating that a survey question can have multiple answers responded to. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Question Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Question data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey question. Local id A survey question's Id. Type: integer isRequired A flag indicating that a survey question requires a response. Type: integer multiAnswer A flag indicating that a survey question can have multiple answers responded to. Type: integer question A survey question's question.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Response Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Response data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey response. Local otherAnswer The user typed response for the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response is associated with. Type: string surveyAnswerId The Id of the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response was made for. Type: integer Relational surveyAnswer The survey answer that this response was to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Response Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Response data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey response. Local otherAnswer The user typed response for the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response is associated with. Type: string surveyAnswerId The Id of the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response was made for. Type: integer Relational surveyAnswer The survey answer that this response was to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Status data type contains survey status information. Local description Description of a survey status Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey status Type: integer name Name of a survey status Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Status data type contains survey status information. Local description Description of a survey status Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey status Type: integer name Name of a survey status Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Type data type contains survey type information. Local description Description of a survey type Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey type Type: integer name Name of a survey type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Type data type contains survey type information. Local description Description of a survey type Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey type Type: integer name Name of a survey type Type: string

item.title: getActiveSurveyByType
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::getActiveSurveyByType Provides survey details for the given type Overview Provides survey details for the given type Parameters Name Type Description type string Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_SurveyObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Survey

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Survey record. Overview getObject retrieves the SoftLayer_Survey object whose ID number corresponds to the ID number of the init parameter passed to the SoftLayer_Survey service. You can only retrieve the survey that your portal user has taken. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_SurveyInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_SurveyObjectMask SoftLayer_SurveyObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Survey

item.title: getQuestions
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::getQuestions Retrieve the questions for a survey. Overview Retrieve the questions for a survey. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_SurveyInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_SurveyObjectMask SoftLayer_SurveyObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Survey_Question[]

item.title: getStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::getStatus Retrieve the status of the survey Overview Retrieve the status of the survey Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_SurveyInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_SurveyObjectMask SoftLayer_SurveyObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Survey_Status

item.title: getType
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::getType Retrieve the type of survey Overview Retrieve the type of survey Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_SurveyInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_SurveyObjectMask SoftLayer_SurveyObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Survey_Type

item.title: takeSurvey
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey::takeSurvey Respond to the questions that a survey has. Overview Response to a SoftLayer survey’s questions. Parameters Name Type Description responses SoftLayer_Survey_Response[] Responses to the survey Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_SurveyInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
